description:
A mysterious fleet of unmanned sentient warships that appeared and defeated mankind`s navies and drove mankind from the seas.
The ships comprising the Fleet of Fog all share appearances and names of ships from World War II, though are armed with weapons and technology far exceeding anything humans have yet developed.
To be able to better understand humans they have begun using female-shaped embodiments of consciousness called "Mental Models" to allow them to perceive the world more like a human.
name: Kiri no Kantai
